articles.title: Coronavirus Outbreak: What lessons can our battle with malaria teach us about tackling COVID-19? - Firstpost
articles.description: COVID-19 presents a unique challenge to India’s policymakers and public health professionals. As they face difficult choices in the coming months, they can draw lessons from India’s recent success against malaria.
